/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of vehicles, including cars and trucks, hinting at the city's active transportation. Buildings of different sizes and designs flank the street, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. In the distance, power lines stretch across the sky, a common sight in many cities. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
